} text='Loading your content...' />
{!user?.result?.name ? : } {user?.result?.userRole !== 'admin' ? : } {user?.result?.userRole !== 'admin' ? : } {user?.result?.userRole !== 'admin' ? : } {user?.result?.userRole !== 'admin' ? : }
) } export default App
